body:
Comment 2: 
Yes, it is true that pprof does not know about /debug/pprof/block.
It is not listed in the code in $GOROOT/misc/pprof. I am not sure exactly how it should
be handled.

Perhaps Dmitriy can add it?
_Labels changed: added **priority-soon**, **go1.2**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Owner changed to @dvyukov._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
